ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centers, offices, and administrative buildings. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with confined spaces in workplaces. Confined spaces include spaces such as those in a vat, tank, pit, pipe, duct, flue, oven, chimney, silo, reaction vessel, container, receptacle, underground sewer, well, shaft, trench, tunnel, or other similar enclosed or partially enclosed structure, which meet certain conditions.
